name: Project Malady (Demo)
description:
Facility 381 is a secret government laboratory developing biological weapons under Project Malady. One fatal mistake after another causes a disaster, and now, a terrible plague was released into the facility. Will you survive?

This game is in development. The following is planned for the full version:

  • Multiplayer mode
  • Map editor
  • Sound
  • Mobile support

Known bugs/glitches:

  • File save/load doesn't work on website
